mapper.select: insert into boardreply(postNumber, replyDate, replyTime, replyContent, nickname, replyRecommendCount, replyNotRecommendCount) values(#{postNumber}, #{replyDate}, #{replyTime}, #{replyContent}, #{nickname}, #{replyRecommendCount}, #{replyNotRecommendCount})
update boardreply set replyRecommendCount = #{replyRecommendCount} where replyNumber = #{replyNumber}
update boardreply set replyNotRecommendCount = #{replyNotRecommendCount} where replyNumber = #{replyNumber}
update boardreply set replyContent = #{replyContent} where replyNumber = #{replyNumber} and nickname = #{nickname}
delete from boardreply where replyNumber = #{replyNumber} and nickname = #{nickname}
